body.v: The origin does not appear as a finished line, but as a margin.
Here, 'margin' does not mean a mere lack or blank space, but a state in which the next order to be drawn has not yet been inscribed.
Anxiety and hesitation are not to be eliminated. Rather, they serve as indicators that mark the boundaries for the next decision.
A sheet of paper filled with writing has no room for new lines. Margin itself is the passage toward the future.
Margin can sometimes give rise to stagnation or idleness. Yet once stagnation is recognized, it already functions as an observation point of change.
